item.title: Install Laravel Dengan Laravel Installer
item.description: install composer dan laravel installer sudo pacman -S composer composer global require laravel/installer perintah diatas akan membuat folder composer directory .config. export laravel ke zsh/bash agar bisa dieksekusi export PATH=$PATH:$HOME/.config/composer/vendor/bin membuat project laravel laravel new project_laravel local development server php artisan serve
